column4: anyone familiar how to use apt (not aptitude) to figure out why a package was installed? i'm assuming apt-cache rdepends but it seems to pull up packages that i don't have installed. how do i limit it to only what i have installed?
try apt-get remove and say no to the confirmation. It'll show you what it wants to remove if you remove the package.
that's one possibility but a risky one
no, not risky at all. apt-get will ask for a confirmation. YOu caould also do apt-get -n remove package foe a dry run
